channel.title: External file
channel.description: I am trying to reduce the size of my 1meg+ client... i have a lot of voids for a swim thing i added. so i tried to add these to an external file, and i got a million errors, i fixed it till i had about 96 errors, now im stumped. sum of the voids have absx and absy, now they are define sumwere in client i would assume, i foudn them in playerhandler but i could not find were it refers to them in client. so neways, it sais cannot refer to a non static variable fro ma static location or sumthin when i added "client." infront of every absx and absy in my new file, so any clues as to how to fix it?

item.title: External file
item.dc:creator: @Hiaburi Hiaburi
item.description:
@Hiaburi wrote:

I am trying to reduce the size of my 1meg+ client… i have a lot of voids for a swim thing i added. so i tried to add these to an external file, and i got a million errors, i fixed it till i had about 96 errors, now im stumped. sum of the voids have absx and absy, now they are define sumwere in client i would assume, i foudn them in playerhandler but i could not find were it refers to them in client. so neways, it sais cannot refer to a non static variable fro ma static location or sumthin when i added “client.” infront of every absx and absy in my new file, so any clues as to how to fix it?
